general: Operating Conditions: -30 °C ~ 60 °C (-22°F ~ 140 °F) humidity 95% or less (non-condensing) Power Supply: 12 VDC ± 10%, PoE (802.3af) Power Consumption: Max. 5W (max. 7W with ICR on) Impact protection: IEC60068-275Eh, 50J; EN50102, up to IK10 Weather Proof: IP66 IR Range: Approx. 10 to 30 meters Dimensions: Φ111 × 82 (4.4” × 3.2”) Weight: 500g (1.1 lb)
